-	script	GlobalMonsterId	-1,{
	end;
	
OnInit:
	if($global_monster_id_version != 5){
		$global_monster_id_version = 5;
		
		deletearray $all_mob_ids[0],getarraysize($all_mob_ids);
		deletearray $all_mob_tier_1_ids[0],getarraysize($all_mob_tier_1_ids);
		deletearray $all_mob_tier_2_ids[0],getarraysize($all_mob_tier_2_ids);
		deletearray $all_mob_tier_3_ids[0],getarraysize($all_mob_tier_3_ids);
		deletearray $all_mob_tier_4_ids[0],getarraysize($all_mob_tier_4_ids);
		deletearray $all_mob_tier_5_ids[0],getarraysize($all_mob_tier_5_ids);
		deletearray $all_mob_tier_6_ids[0],getarraysize($all_mob_tier_6_ids);
		deletearray $all_mob_tier_7_ids[0],getarraysize($all_mob_tier_7_ids);
		
		setarray $all_mob_ids[0],1004,1001,1002,1005,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013,1014,1015,1016,1018,1019,1020,1023,1024,1025,1026,1028,1029,1030,1031,1032,1033,1034,1035,1036,1037,1038,1039,1040,1041,1042,1044,1045,1046,1047,1048,1049,1050,1051,1052,1053,1054,1055,1056,1057,1058,1059,1060,1061,1062,1063,1064,1065,1066,1067,1068,1069,1070,1071,1072,1073,1074,1076,1077,1078,1079,1080,1081,1082,1083,1084,1085,1086,1087,1088,1089,1090,1091,1092,1093,1094,1095,1096,1097,1098,1099,1100,1101,1102,1103,1104,1105,1106,1107,1108,1109,1110,1111,1112,1113,1114,1115,1116,1117,1118,1119,1120,1121,1122,1123,1124,1125,1126,1127,1128,1129,1130,1131,1132,1133,1134,1135,1136,1137,1138,1139,1140,1141,1142,1143,1144,1145,1146,1147,1148,1149,1150,1151,1152,1153,1154,1155,1156,1157,1158,1159,1160,1161,1162,1163,1164,1165,1166,1167,1169,1170,1174,1175,1176,1177,1178,1179,1180,1182,1183,1184,1185,1186,1188,1189,1190,1191,1192,1193,1194,1195,1196,1197,1198,1199,1200,1201,1202,1203,1204,1205,1206,1207,1208,1209,1211,1212,1213,1214,1215,1216,1219,1220,1221,1229,1230,1231,1232,1234,1235,1236,1237,1238,1239,1240,1241,1242,1243,1244,1245,1246,1247,1248,1249,1250,1251,1252,1253,1254,1255,1256,1257,1258,1259,1260,1261,1262,1263,1264,1265,1266,1267,1268,1269,1270,1271,1272,1273,1274,1275,1276,1277,1278,1279,1280,1281,1282,1283,1285,1286,1287,1288,1289,1290,1291,1292,1293,1294,1295,1296,1297,1298,1299,1300,1301,1302,1303,1304,1305,1306,1307,1308,1309,1310,1311,1312,1313,1314,1315,1316,1317,1318,1319,1320,1321,1322,1323,1324,1325,1326,1327,1328,1329,1330,1331,1332,1333,1334,1335,1336,1337,1338,1339,1340,1341,1342,1343,1344,1345,1346,1347,1348,1349,1350,1351,1352,1353,1354,1355,1356,1357,1358,1359,1360,1361,1362,1363,1364,1365,1366,1367,1368,1369,1370,1371,1372,1373,1374,1375,1376,1377,1378,1379,1380,1381,1382,1383,1384,1385,1386,1387,1388,1389,1390,1391,1392,1393,1394,1395,1396,1397,1398,1399,1400,1401,1402,1403,1404,1405,1406,1408,1409,1410,1412,1413,1415,1416,1417,1418,1419,1420,1421,1422,1423,1424,1425,1426 ,1829,1830,1831,1832,1833,1834,1835,1836,1837,1838,1839,1840,1841,1842,1843,1844,1845,1846,1847,1848,1849,1850,1851,1852,1853,1854,1855,1856,1857,1858,1859,1860,1861,1862,1863,1864,1865,1866,1867,1868,1869,1870,1871,1872,1873,1874,1875,1876,1877,1878,1879,1880,1881,1882,1883,1884,1885,1886,1887,1888,1889,1890,1891,1892,1893,1894,1895,1896,1897,1898,1899,1900,1901,1902,1903,1904,1905,1906,1907,1908,1909,1910,1911,1912,1913,1914,1915,1916,1917,1918,1919,1920,1921,1922,1923,1924,1925,1926,1927,1928,1929,1930,1931,1932,1933,1934,1935,1936,1937,1938,1939,1940,1941,1942,1943,1944,1945,1946,1947,1948,1949,1950,1951,1952,1953,1954,1955,1956,1957,1958,1959,1960,1961,1962,1963,1964,1965,1966,1967,1968,1969,1970,1971,1972,1973,1974,1975,1976,1977,1978,1979,1980,1981,1982,1983,1984,1985,1986,1987,1988,1989,1990,1991,1992,1993,1994,1995,1997,1998,1999,2000,2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,2014,2015,2016,2017,2018,2019,2020,2021,2022,2023,2024,2025,2026,2027,2030,2031,2032,2033,2034,2035,2036,2037,2038,2039,2040,2041,2042,2043,2044,2045,2046,2047,2048,2049,2050,2052,2057,2058,2059,2060,2066,2067,2068,2069,2070,2071,2072,2073,2074,2075,2076,2077,2078,2079,2080,2081,2082,2083,2084,2085,2086,2087,2088,2089,2090,2091,2092,2093,2094,2095,2096,2097,2098,2099,2100,2101,2102,2103,2104,2105,2106,2107,2108,2109,2110,2111,2112,2113,2126,2127,2128,2129,2130,2131,2132,2133,2134,2135,2136,2137,2138,2139,2140,2141,2142,2143,2144,2145,2146,2147,2148,2149,2150,2151,2152,2153,2154,2155,2156,2157,2158,2159,2160,2161,2162,2163,2164,2165,2166,2167,2168,2169,2170,2171,2172,2173,2174,2175,2176,2177,2178,2179,2180,2181,2182,2183,2184,2185,2186,2187,2188,2189,2190,2191,2192,2193,2194,2195,2196,2197,2198,2199,2200,2201,2202,2203,2204,2206,2208,2209,2210,2211,2212,2213,2214,2215,2216,2217,2218,2219,2220,2221,2222,2223,2224,2225,2226,2227,2228,2229,2230,2231,2232,2233,2234,2235,2236,2237,2238,2239,2240,2241,2242,2243,2244,2245,2246,2247,2248,2249,2250,2251,2252,2253,2254,2255 ,2724,2725,2726,2727,2728,2729,2730,2731,2732,2733,2734,2735,2736,2737,2738,2739,2740,2741,2742,2743,2744,2745,2746,2747,2748,2749,2750,2751,2752,2753,2754,2755,2756,2757,2758,2759,2760,2761,2762,2763,2764,2765,2766,2767,2768,2769,2770,2771,2772,2773,2774,2775,2776,2777,2778,2779,2780,2781,2782,2783,2784,2785,2786,2787,2788,2789,2790,2791,2792,2793,2794,2795,2796,2797,2798,2799,2800,2801,2802,2803,2804,2805,2806,2807,2808,2809,2810,2811,2812,2813,2814,2815,2816,2817,2818,2819,2820,2821,2822,2823,2824,2825,2826,2827,2828,2829,2830,2831,2832,2833,2834,2835,2836,2837,2838,2839,2840,2841,2842,2843,2844,2845,2846,2847,2848,2849,2850,2851,2852,2853,2854,2855,2856,2857,2858,2859,2860,2861,2862,2863,2864,2865,2866,2867,2868,2869,2870,2871,2872,2873,2874,2875,2876,2877,2878,2879,2880,2881,2882,2883,2884,2885,2886,2887,2888,2889,2890,2891,2892,2893,2894,2895,2896,2897,2898,2899,2900,2901,2902,2903,2904,2905,2906,2907,2908,2909,2910,2911,2912,2913,2914,2916,2917,2918,2919,2920,2921,2922,2923,2924,2925,2926,2927,2928,2929,2930,2931,2932,2933,2934,2935,2936,2937,2938,2939,2940,2941,2942,2943,2948,2949,2950,2951,2952,2953,2954,2955,2956,2957,2958,2959,2960,2961,2987,2988,2989,2990,2991,2992,2993,2994,2995,2996,2997,2998,2999,3000,3001,3002,3003,3004,3005,3006,3007,3008,3010,3011,3012,3013,3014,3015,3016,3017,3018,3020,3021,3022,3023,3026,3027,3028,3029,3038,3039,3040,3041,3061,3069,3070,3071,3072,3073,3074,3075,3076,3077,3078,3079,3080,3081,3082,3083,3084,3085,3086,3087,3088,3089,3090,3091,3092,3096,3097,3098,3099,3101,3102,3103,3105,3106,3108,3109,3122,3123,3124,3125,3126,3127,3128,3153,3154,3155,3156,3157,3158,3159,3161,3169,3170,3175,3176,3177,3178,3179,3180,3181,3190,3191,3192,3193,3194,3195,3196,3197,3198,3199,3200,3202,3203,3208,3209,3210,3211,3212,3213,3214,3215,3216,3217,3218,3219,3220,3221,3222,3223,3224,3225,3226,3227,3228,3229,3230,3231,3232,3233,3234,3235,3236,3237,3238,3239,3240,3241,3242,3243,3244,3245,3246,3247,3248,3249,3250,3251,3252,3253,3254,3255,3256,3384,3385,3386,3387,3388,3389,3390,3391,3392,3393,3394,3395,3396,3397,3398,3399,3400,3401,3402,3403,3404,3405,3406,3407,3408,3409,3410,3411,3412,3413,3414,3415,3416,3417,3418,3419,3420,3421,3422,3423,3424,3425,3426,3427,3428,3429,3430,3431,3432,3433,3434,3435,3436,3437,3438,3439,3440,3442,3443,3444,3445,3446,3447,3448,3449,3450,3451,3452,3454,3455,3473,3474,3475,3476,3477,3478,3479,3480,3481,3482,3483,3484,3485,3487,3488,3489,3490,3494,3495,3496,3497,3498,3499,3500,3501,3502,3503,3504,3505,3506,3507,3508,3621,3622,3623,3624,3625,3626,3627,3628,3629,3630,3631,3632,3633,3636,3669,3670,3736,3737,3738,3739,3740,3741,3742,3743,3744,3745,3746,3747,3748,3749,3758,3759,3760,3761,3762,3763,3764,3765,3787,3788,3790,20269,20834,20835,20836,20837,20848,20849,20850,20851;
		
		$all_mob_id_size = getarraysize($all_mob_ids);
		
		// Level range
		.tier_1_lv = 10;
		.tier_2_lv = 40;
		.tier_3_lv = 60;
		.tier_4_lv = 80;
		.tier_5_lv = 100;
		.tier_6_lv = 120;
		.tier_7_lv = 150;
		
		freeloop(1);
		
		for(.@i = 0; .@i < $all_mob_id_size; .@i++){
			.@monster_id = $all_mob_ids[.@i];
			
			.@monster_level = getmonsterinfo(.@monster_id,MOB_LV);
			
			if((.@monster_level > 0)	&& (.@monster_level < .tier_1_lv))
			setarray $all_mob_tier_1_ids[getarraysize($all_mob_tier_1_ids)],.@monster_id;
			else if((.@monster_level >= .tier_1_lv) && (.@monster_level < .tier_2_lv))
			setarray $all_mob_tier_2_ids[getarraysize($all_mob_tier_2_ids)],.@monster_id;
			else if((.@monster_level >= .tier_2_lv) && (.@monster_level < .tier_3_lv))
			setarray $all_mob_tier_3_ids[getarraysize($all_mob_tier_3_ids)],.@monster_id;
			else if((.@monster_level >= .tier_3_lv) && (.@monster_level < .tier_4_lv))
			setarray $all_mob_tier_4_ids[getarraysize($all_mob_tier_4_ids)],.@monster_id;
			else if((.@monster_level >= .tier_4_lv) && (.@monster_level < .tier_5_lv))
			setarray $all_mob_tier_5_ids[getarraysize($all_mob_tier_5_ids)],.@monster_id;
			else if((.@monster_level >= .tier_5_lv) && (.@monster_level < .tier_6_lv))
			setarray $all_mob_tier_6_ids[getarraysize($all_mob_tier_6_ids)],.@monster_id;
			else if(.@monster_level >= .tier_7_lv)
			setarray $all_mob_tier_7_ids[getarraysize($all_mob_tier_7_ids)],.@monster_id;
		}
		
		freeloop(0);
		
		$all_mob_id_tier_1_size = getarraysize($all_mob_tier_1_ids);
		$all_mob_id_tier_2_size = getarraysize($all_mob_tier_2_ids);
		$all_mob_id_tier_3_size = getarraysize($all_mob_tier_3_ids);
		$all_mob_id_tier_4_size = getarraysize($all_mob_tier_4_ids);
		$all_mob_id_tier_5_size = getarraysize($all_mob_tier_5_ids);
		$all_mob_id_tier_6_size = getarraysize($all_mob_tier_6_ids);
		$all_mob_id_tier_7_size = getarraysize($all_mob_tier_7_ids);
	}
	end;
}
